ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Data used as examples to demonstrate GAMLSS models.
Data used as examples to demonstrate GAMLSS models.

name: r-gamlss.data
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "6.0-7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gamlss.data
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/gamlss.data_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/gamlss.data/gamlss.data_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8028c2453541a6dea92d587ca23cf7f79bae8fc9f3588bbff6ff7eea71d86771

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gamlss.data')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gamlss.data')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.gamlss.org/
  license: GPL-2 | GPL-3
  summary: Data used as examples to demonstrate GAMLSS models.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: gamlss.data
# Description: Data used as examples to demonstrate GAMLSS models.
# Title: GAMLSS Data
# LazyData: yes
# Version: 5.1-4
# Date: 2019-05-14
# Depends: R (>= 2.10)
# Author: Mikis Stasinopoulos <d.stasinopoulos@londonmet.ac.uk>, Bob Rigby, Fernanda De Bastiani
# Maintainer: Mikis Stasinopoulos <d.stasinopoulos@londonmet.ac.uk>
# License: GPL-2 | GPL-3
# URL: http://www.gamlss.org/
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-14 09:00:19 UTC; MikisStasinopoulos
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-15 09:40:07 UTC
